name: Drink Idle
description:
Own the hottest new bar in the galaxy! Welcome your guests with all kinds of drinks.

Unlock crazy themed bars for vampires or bunny people and sell TONS of drinks.

Upgrade your bars to make more money.

Can you run all the bars?
developers: RUBY OYUN VE YAZILIM DANISMANLIK SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: RUBY OYUN VE YAZILIM DANISMANLIK SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
